divs: Sighting Detailswe went to observe comet from foothills in N Phoenix and on the way back weobserved object over south mountain many miles away and it was huge. It lookedlike a very large building with the lights on about 20-30 miles away except itwas above the mountain in the air. I would say it was twice the size of 6-7stories of a skyscraper that could also be seen downtown approx. same distance.Then noticed some of the lights were going off and on. It just hovered, slowlydescending.we saw it off and on for about 5 minutes until we got into the flatsof the valley. We then went to a church parking lot open area to see if we couldsee it but it was gone.I could barely tell that it had a frame of some sortsupporting the lights but we were just to far away to tell much about it.Theentire object was rigid frame and lights during the observation. Ive been aMETAR observer in the past and have worked on a army test range USAYPGand cannotcompare it to any air vehicle ive ever seen.
